General.Name: Bosch Fren Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Bosch Fren Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the production and sale of hydraulic brake systems for automotive and light commercial vehicles in Turkey and internationally. It offers servo brakes, and brake master cylinders and support systems. The company was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Bursa, Turkey. Bosch Fren Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH.
General.Address: Fethiye OSB Mahallesi Sari Cad. No 8A, Bursa, Turkey, 16140
